## Source: amazon-inspector (13eeb23685dac84d542d197d77303c42cf1157c465348c204b391edca71c782d)
The package node-calculator-4e41 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (07219b0795ed76528696344552f552d0b6840125ee605cbd0d4eeaad91c0b5ed)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-calculator-4e41' @ 2.6.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
